strings.activeDrefTableStatusDraftDescription: The form is in its initial stage and has not been finalized yet.
strings.activeDrefTableStatusFinalizingDescripti: The form is being finalized. The fields are being translated to English.
strings.activeDrefTableStatusFinalizedDescriptio: The form has been finalized, and the original language has been switched to English. All further edits must now be made in English.
strings.activeDrefTableStatusApprovedDescription: The form has been reviewed and approved.
strings.activeDrefTableStatusFailedDescription: The form finalization process has failed. You can retry to finalize the form again
